name: Who Made That Sound (ADA final project)
name_original: Who Made That Sound (ADA final project)
description:
I made this project as my final project while studying at the Academy of Digital Arts. My specialisation was game graphics.

I made this project for Pebbles Project to use in their ECD centres to teach children the different farm animal noises. I am hoping to expand it further to include many different themes in the future.

With this project I wanted to make something  that would be easy to understand, visually fun, and quite colorful. I wanted all the graphic elements to fit together and look believable in a farm setting.

All 3D assets and their textures are my own. I modeled and rigged them in Blender and painted the textures in either Photoshop or Procreate. All UI elements were drawn in Procreate by me.

The animal sounds, feeding sounds, and ambient noise are from a pack I purchased on the Unity Asset Store and the intro music is a royalty free song I downloaded from Pixabay. All other sound, including footsteps, were recoded by me.

For the script I took the code Brakeys wrote in his Quiz game tutorial and modified it with the elements I needed for this game in particular.
